snippet.title: ROCKET ROGER - C64 Longplay
snippet.description:
The spaceman Rocket Roger, named thus because of the rocket driven jet pack that is attached to his back, is stranded with his spaceship on a dark, inhospitable planet somewhere in the galaxy many light years away from the Earth due to lack of fuel.
Fortunately, there are shiny energy crystals scattered on the planet, which Rocket Roger can use to supplement the fuel supplies of his spaceship. If he makes it to collect 99 of these crystals, he can contiue his travel home.
Only equipped with his jet pack and a hand laser he needs to explore the 30 different zones of the planet and defy the various obstacles and opponents, because unfortunately the planet is not quite uninhabited.

Hint:
Basically, you should not linger in a zone for too long, because otherwise a guard in the shape of a rotating black ball will appear after approx. 25 seconds and will chase the poor Roger until it inveitably catches up with him and takes one of his 5 lives.


00:00  Game Documents
02:40  Gameplay
30:05  Ending


BMC64 (RasPi 3 B+) HDMI capture at 720p / 50Hz.

Snapshots were used for this video.
